title: Book-it-Yourself
description: Book-it-yourself is an app that connects artists and promoters across the globe.

title: D&D Character Generator
description: Dungeons & Dragons (also abbreviated as D&D or DnD) is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game that was first published in 1974. This application simulates the character generated portions of the game. Simply view all of your created characters, create a new character, and roll the dice!

title: Day Planner
description: A calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of the day. Using JavaScript, jQuery, moment.js

title: Github Profile Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a PDF profile from a GitHub username

title: Mamma-Mia Search
description: Mamma Mia is a search engine application that allows users to look up music events in the United States.

title: Password Generator
description: A simple application that generates a random password based on a user-selected criteri.
